text: Yumlembam is a Meetei Manipuri surname or family name which has Indian origin. People of this family mainly live in Manipur, India. The YEK/SALAI for this Manipuri's surname YUMLEMBAM is LUWANG [ which represent the sun ]. The yek/salai in Manipuri's culture is like differents CLANs. == References == Category:Meitei surnames
title: Yumlembam
